trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_TODO_00<tab>Slay highwing chapulis and obtain their legs.
TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the chapuli legs to Weidheri.

TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_WEIDHERI_000_000<tab>Oh, hey there. Thanks again for helping me before. Word around town is you're some sort of adventurer, is that right? I'm in a bit of a tight spot, and you're likely the only one who can help me.

TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_WEIDHERI_000_001<tab>You see, I need legs from the chapulis hopping about outside of town─three or so should do the trick. I'd go myself, but they'd stomp me in the ground faster than a sabotender in a sandstorm.
TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_WEIDHERI_000_002<tab>What do I need them for? You'll have to wait and see.
TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_WEIDHERI_000_003<tab>You won't have to go far to find the chapulis hopping around out there. If you can get me three of their legs, that should be more than enough.

TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_WEIDHERI_000_011<tab>These are pretty plump. Looks like you found a lively lot out there. Aye, these'll make for a good stew. It's a specialty of mine─a nice, spicy broth with chunks of meat so tender they practically melt in your mouth. I find chapuli legs work best.
TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_WEIDHERI_000_012<tab>The Garleans thought we were savages for eating the stuff, but now that they're gone, this Ala Ghiri stew is back on the menu.
TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_WEIDHERI_000_013<tab>I'm sure the soldiers will find it a welcome change from the rock-hard breads and salted meats they're used to.
TEXT_STMBDZ810_02838_WEIDHERI_000_014<tab>And you too. Be sure to stop by for a bowl sometime. My treat.
